1.title: Remix of Love

episode of.title: I Dream of Nene: The Wedding (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: After 15 years of marriage and a divorce, NeNe and Gregg are engaged...again. NeNe has grand plans for her fantasy wedding, but first NeNe has a few bones to pick: getting a prenup and mending family relationships, which won't be easy when Gregg is hesitant to participate.

2.title: Patch the Leakes

episode of.title: I Dream of Nene: The Wedding (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: NeNe and Gregg are supposed to be planning their upcoming wedding, but they get sidelined by past issues.

3.title: Bridesmaidzillas Stampede

episode of.title: I Dream of Nene: The Wedding (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: NeNe is trying her best to clear all the skeletons out of her family's closet before the wedding, but her blowout with Gregg's oldest son nearly derails the family balance. Still, NeNe has a wedding to plan, even if things aren't 100% settled with the Leakes. Perhaps getting away to L.A. with her bridesmaids is the perfect medicine to get her mind off of the drama. But, NeNe is not so sure it is a good idea once their sunny Hollywood trip turns into a shade-throwing contest. She goes from one disgruntled family to another when her bridesmaid "sisters" go for blood at ...

4.title: Cancel the Wedding!

episode of.title: I Dream of Nene: The Wedding (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: NeNe has returned from L.A. and now it's time to kick her wedding into high gear, but her planner is M.I.A. Once she finally comes face to face with Tiffany, it quickly turns ugly. Gregg doesn't agree, and an argument ensues. Now it's bride vs. groom, a prenup is still not in place and hardly any wedding planning has been done. With the clock ticking, how can NeNe pull this whole wedding together before everything implodes?

5.title: Spilling the Tea Party

episode of.title: I Dream of Nene: The Wedding (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Nene is stressed out because it's only three weeks to her wedding and very little has been done - she has no invitations, no venue and no prenup still. Her new wedding planner tells her there's not enough time to have the location of her dreams. To make matters worse, all of her bridesmaids are coming into town for fittings, and they still haven't stopped poking at each other. To retaliate, NeNe plans her revenge: to poke back at them and hash it all out at a "spilling the tea" party, which quickly turns from high society to low blows.

6.title: Something Blue

episode of.title: I Dream of Nene: The Wedding (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: NeNe and her nine bridesmaids are headed to Cancun for a bachelorette weekend...and NeNe has made it clear that she wants it to be peaceful. It's all fun frolicking in the sun with dolphins, until NeNe's beautiful bachelorette "blue" party is stopped cold by Marlo's insistence on not being a team player. The ladies all feel that Marlo was dead wrong to steal the focus and not play along, which leaves NeNe wondering if Marlo will try to take the spotlight from her on the wedding day.

7.title: Season Finale

episode of.title: I Dream of Nene: The Wedding (TV Series 2013– )

8.title: The Wedding, Part 2

episode of.title: I Dream of Nene: The Wedding (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: The stress is high as the days are winding down to NeNe and Gregg's wedding day. Will they rise above all of the drama and tie the knot once and for all?

9.title: The Wedding

episode of.title: I Dream of Nene: The Wedding (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: In the two-hour season finale of "I Dream of NeNe: The Wedding," stress is high as the days are winding down to NeNe and Gregg's wedding day. To make matters worse, there is no indication that this will look like the dream wedding NeNe envisioned. Meanwhile, celebrity guests including Vivica Fox, Fantasia and Judge Mathis battle with the wedding party for attention. But the biggest roadblock to the trip down the aisle is the pre-nup that Gregg stonewalls and a sudden panic attack ensues that could sabotage everything. Will NeNe and Gregg be able to rise above all of ...

imdb.plot outline: 'I Dream of NeNe: The Wedding' proves that the second time around is a charm as the new docu-series features the nuptials of former spouses NeNe and Gregg Leakes. Fans have gotten up close and personal with the couple during "The Real Housewives of Atlanta," watching their happy marriage, devastating divorce and romantic reconnection. The stars align as the Leakes are ready to tie the knot once again in an extravagant wedding fit for a larger-than-life personality like NeNe.
imdb.title: I Dream of Nene: The Wedding
akas: I Dream of Nene: The Wedding (United States)
